pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analytic Insurance Rating Techniques // Functions to build, evaluate, and visualize insurance rating models. It simplifies the process of modeling premiums, and allows to analyze insurance risk factors effectively. The package employs a data- driven strategy for constructing insurance tariff classes, drawing on the work of Antonio and Valdez (2012) doi:10.1007/s10182-011-0152-7.
